caption: It mainly narrates the detective and his friend investigating a case of assaulting a lady. At the same time, it reveals the relationship between the friend and his girlfriend. Highlights include: the detective and his friend investigating the assault on the lady, the detective demands the release of the boys, the detective discovers the friend's girlfriend is the culprit, the detective helps the friend salvage the relationship with his girlfriend, their friendship is tested, they find out the girlfriend likes to play games, the detective uses a mobile camera to find out the girlfriend is still alive, they make some foolish mistakes in the case, their friendship is ultimately mended, and both enjoy playing games.
